name: Red Lorry Yellow Lorry

overview:
We’re all about good communications, and we go about it in two ways. We help organisations of all sorts and sizes improve their brand experience through better writing - and we create vibrant PR for companies in technology, telecoms and media.

Our brand communication teams create a tone of voice that brings a company personality and values to life â€“ and then put it to good use throughout a business.Simply put, we help businesses put the right words in the right order â€“ and in the right places.

Our brand communications clients include: Citroen, Volkswagen Group, AEGON, eBay, Apadmi, BBC, Balfour Beatty Utility Solutions, BNP Paribas Securities Services, Britannia Building Society, Business Stream, Equifax, First Great Western, Institute of Customer Service â€“ ICS, JDi, Jupiter, Lakeland, LV=, Midas Homes, National Savings & Investments, NCFE, POFS, Sothebyâ€™s, Stannah Stairlifts, Viking Direct, Virgin Atlantic, Virgin Holidays, Visit Britain/Enjoy England etc

Our PR teams have specialist areas of technology expertise â€“ including ICT, media and telecoms. Our clients are providers of both the technology and the content that runs on it â€“ and benefit from our intimate industry know-how and long-standing media relationships.

PR clients include: AMD, Cinesite, Nevion, Autodesk, ITFC, Aspera, Nagravision, Saddington & Baynes, ON-AIR Systems, Duke, For-A, Smoke and Mirrors, Ascent Media, SPB Software, PPC Group, Comverse, Intamac, Magdalene, Mobile Distillery, Movidilo, Limited Space, Gorillabox, Guinness World Records, Fun Text, TIM w.e, Enterprise Ireland, RAD data communications etc
